name: CATS AND COFFEE
description:
For Ludum Dare 51- Give us a rating here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/cats-and-coffee

Theme: Every 10 Seconds

Cats spawn every 10 seconds. Last an entire shift (2 minutes) to win! 

-Click the escapee kitties several times to prevent them from reaching the door (But make sure you’re not holding anything before doing so!)

-When you are holding the correct combination of ingredients, you can click on a customer’s icon so they can enjoy their beverage.

-3 mistakes == lose

Art: Graylure

Code: Clonze

Sounds: https://freesound.org/ Sound voices: https://acedio.github.io/animalese.js/
